attributes.name: accent-background
attributes.description: Apply accent color to card background

attributes.name: accent-heading
attributes.description: Apply accent color to heading

attributes.name: flat
attributes.description: Display the card as flat (no box shadow);

attributes.name: horizontal
attributes.description: Display the card as a horizontal layout? Default is vertical.

attributes.name: image-align
attributes.description:
"Optional": The horizontal alignment of the image, so that:
- "left" will align the left edge of the image.
- "right" will align the right edge of the image.
- "center" will align the center of the image
- A null will allow temporary support to the deprecated CSS variables

attributes.name: image-src
attributes.description: "Optional": The source for an image on the card

attributes.name: image-valign
attributes.description:
"Optional": The vertical alignment of the image, so that:
- "top" will align the top of edge of the image.
- "bottom" will align the bottom edge of the image.
- "center" will align the middle of the image.
- A null will allow temporary support to the deprecated CSS variables

attributes.name: no-border
attributes.description: Removes the think accent border
